title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Skills: Clinical Simulation-Based Respiratory Therapy Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Respiratory Therapy Theory and Basic Knowledge of Clinical Procedures
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners apply patient assessment and intervention techniques with 80% or higher accuracy through respiratory therapy simulation scenarios.
Learners enhance clinical judgment skills by 30% through feedback utilization based on formative assessments.
Perform emergency response protocols with over 90% accuracy through team-based simulation learning
Analyze simulation assessment results to develop self-reflection and learning plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
